The Mixtagon

Design & Development

This is a personal project site created using Processwire CMF, an open source PHP framework and Content Management System. The Mixtagon allows members to create playlists by uploading music files and a small narrative. The purpose is to create music playlists based on a theme. Members can challenge each other on a particular theme and compete with their playlists. Playlist audio players are created withaudiojs.

  • PHP development
  • Javascript development
  • Responsive design
  • Concept and execution
